articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Establishments in Kanggye City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Light Industrial Establishments in Kanggye City
Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to light industrial establishments in Kanggye City.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the newly-built Jangjasan Combined Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before a huge map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il went round its production processes for hours to learn in detail about the construction, technological updating and production there.
					
					 Learning in detail about processed wild fruits and wild vegetables including wild pear juice and varieties of other foodstuff including sliced vegetables preserved in soy sauce, noodle, rice cake, sweets and cake, and even tasting them, he was very pleased that now it has become possible to supply the people with much more delicious and nutritious foodstuff.
					
					 He extended thanks to officials, workers and technicians of relevant factories and enterprises who provided high-level food processing equipment by devoting their wisdom and energy.
					
					 He advanced important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 Stressing the need for the officials, workers and technicians of the factory to boost production in the spirit of warm love for the people, he called for producing more processed foodstuff including delicious and nutritious subsidiary food so as to successfully carry out the instructions of President Kim Il Sung on completely freeing women from household chores. 
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Kanggye Essential Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 Making the rounds of different production processes of the factory, he got familiar in detail with its technical updating and production. 
					
					 Watching varieties of essential foodstuff meeting popular taste being churned out in an endless stream, he highly praised officials, workers and technicians for having kept production going at a high rate after placing all the production processes on a scientific and technological basis by pooling their wisdom and efforts.   
					
					 Underscoring the need to make essential foodstuff tasty as it is consumed by everybody, he urged the factory to intensify research into this field in a bid to ensure unique technical indices and put production process on a high level of scientific basis. 
					
					 The third leg of his guidance was the Kanggye Koryo Medicine Factory.
					
					 He went round the interior and exterior of the factory to acquaint himself in detail with the production there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the factory has been kept neat and tidy in terms of sanitation and cultural practice as a pharmaceutical factory and that it is producing a lot of Koryo medicine of high efficacy with various medical plants found in abundance in local areas. 
					
					 Our ancestors lived in good health, having illness cured by use of Koryo medicine alone for thousands of years, he said, stressing that it is of weighty importance for promoting the people's health to develop traditional Koryo medicine. 
					
					 He noted that in order to increase the effect of treatment by Koryo medicine it is necessary to decisively put the production of Koryo medicine on a scientific and industrial basis so that herbal extracts may be produced. 
					
					 The people in the province who grew remarkably stronger through the "Arduous March," the forced march, are now dashing ahead like the wind towards the eminence of a thriving nation after turning their cities, villages and factories and worksites into a land of bliss by themselves, he noted, highly appreciating the patriotic enthusiasm of the officials, party members and other working people in the province, the courageous pace-setters in the era of Songun.  
					
					 World-startling miracles and feats are being reported everyday from the province where the march of the revolution is ringing loud, he said, adding that this stirring reality is the brilliant fruition of the Kanggye spirit and a manifestation of the inexhaustible mental power of the Korean people. 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the working people in Kanggye and other parts of the province would continue to creditably play the role of a pioneer in the dynamic drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, and Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Youth Electrical Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Huichon Youth Electrical Complex
Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Huichon Youth Electrical Complex alive with a great revolutionary surge.
					 After making the rounds of the production processes, he saw electrical appliances newly produced by the complex and acquainted himself in detail with the production there. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex have put the complex on a modern and scientific basis by dint of up-to-date technology in a short span of time and actively studied and developed new technology, thus bringing about a signal turn in the production of electrical products.
					
					 The workers of the complex solved lots of scientific and technological problems by their own efforts and with their own technology by displaying creative ingenuity and boosting cooperation, thus bringing about an eye-opening change in the production, he said, adding that this is a precious fruition of a high-pitched drive waged by the workers to push back the frontiers of latest science with unusual determination to glorify the country before the world by means of intelligence and technology.
					
					 It is a signal success that the officials, workers and technicians of the complex have produced cutting-edge electrical products in a brief span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology, he noted, highly appreciating such shining feat as providing an excellent gift to the 65th anniversary of the founding of the party and its conference and extending thanks to them. 
					
					 He noted that these laudable achievements made by the complex go to prove that it is possible to successfully attain any goal of latest science and technology when the inexhaustible mental power and creative ingenuity of Kim Il Sung's nation and strong technological and economic potentials are given play.  
					
					 Pointing out that those who push back the frontiers of science are conquerors and victors in the future in the age of knowledge-based economy which makes rapid progress thanks to the comprehensive development of science and technology, massive accumulation of knowledge and its wide use, he called for waging a strenuous drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science on all fronts for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 He once again ardently called on all fields and units to intensify the drive for bringing about a leap forward to get the fireworks of victory and jubilation magnificently displayed in the sky during the auspicious October festival. 
					
					 He set forth tasks to be carried out by the complex to keep production going at a high rate and expressed great expectation and conviction that its workers would creditably perform the role of vanguard and shock brigade in the great drive for building a thriving nation in the future, too. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Swiss President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Swiss President
Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Doris Leuthard, President of Switzerland, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger day by day and wished Switzerland steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Myanmar FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Myanmar FM
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Talks between Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, on a visit to Myanmar and U Nyan Win, foreign minister of Myanmar, took place in Nay Pyi Taw on July 30.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Pak's party and the DPRK ambassador to Myanmar and from the opposite side the director general of political department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the director general of its department for ASEAN affairs and officials concerned.
					
					 At the talks the two sides exchanged views on the issue of developing the friendly relations between the two countries and regional and international issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Swiss National Day Observed
articles.content:
Swiss National Day Observed 
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Katharina Zellweger, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation here, hosted a reception on Saturday to mark the national day of the Swiss Confederation.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, at the Chilgol Revolutionary Site and her grave in Mangyongdae on Saturday on the occasion of the 78th anniversary of her death.
					 Seen standing before the statue and grave were wreaths from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, and servicepersons and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the statue and grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, educational and public health organs, revolutionary schools and party and power organs, factories and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kang Pan Sok, looking back on her brilliant revolutionary life.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok, Great Revolutionary of Korea
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok, Great Revolutionary of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A lot of people have visited the statue of Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary and an outstanding leader of the Korean women's emancipation movement, at the Chilgol Revolutionary Site on the occasion of her 78th death anniversary, July 31.
					 She devoted her all to the revolutionary cause, taking the country and the nation dearer than her family.
					
					 In the teeth of the harsh repression by the Japanese imperialists during their colonial rule, she helped members of her family in their revolutionary work and ran any risk for the sake of the country and the nation.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was in danger in Fusong together with his comrades one day in the early period of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Kang Pan Sok, mother of the President, was informed of her son's determination to fight his way through the enemy encirclement and went to him, breaking through a tight police cordon with Mausers hidden in some ribs of beef. 
					
					 When she was laid up with illness in Xiaoshahe, the President visited her before leaving for south Manchuria with the newly-found Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army. 
					
					 As the President was reluctant to depart from his mother, afraid of her sickness, she said:
					
					 How can a man who has turned out with a determination to win back his country cope with the great cause when he has such a weak heart and so many worries about his home. You must think of your lost country and its people. 
					
					 The President said in his reminiscences that he renewed his resolve by recalling the words his mother had said to him as she pushed him off to south Manchuria, and the last image of his mother dressed in white seeing him off, before seeking recourse to an ideology or philosophical proposition.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts War Maneuvers for Invading DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts War Maneuvers for Invading DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The KCNA on Saturday issued an indictment titled "We condemn DPRK-targeted war maneuvers which may bring the second June 25 war" denouncing the joint naval exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 The indictment said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group stage the largest-ever joint naval exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 The joint naval exercises are aimed to mount a surprise strike at the DPRK in the sea and air and launch to a nuclear war. 
					
					 The largest-ever joint naval exercises were staged in the East Sea of Korea from July 25 to 28.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique hurled into these war maneuvers armed forces more than ten times those involved in the preceding joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. hurled latest offensive means into the maneuvers, prompted by the heinous aim to make a "simultaneous strike" on the whole of the northern half of Korea.
					
					 "George Washington", super-large nuclear-powered carrier belonging to the U.S. Seventh Fleet called a "floating military base" whose radius of operation is 1 000 km and which is capable of making more than 150 sorties a day was busy with war maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea with dozens of aircraft including various type fighters and early warning planes aboard.
					
					 The recent joint naval exercises were kicked off under the simulated conditions of northward "march" of huge armed forces, backed by the aircraft carrier, and dozens of combat warships and combat and technical equipment started different exercises with them as a base.
					
					 The U.S. hurled F-22A Raptor into the joint naval exercises for the first time though this type aircraft was not used in the Iraqi and Afghan wars.
					
					 Involved in the war maneuvers were at least 200 aircraft including F-16, A-10, KC-135 and more than 20 warships and over 8 000 troops. It was preposterous for the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique to bluster that they were aimed at finding out submarines of someone and deterring "provocation" though they hurled such huge armed forces into the exercises. 
					
					 The whole course of their joint naval exercises was aimed at mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 What matters is that the said maneuvers did not end up simply "demonstrating armed forces".
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique announced that they would stage more than ten joint military exercises including anti-submarine drills in the sea, air and land till the end of the year in the wake of the joint naval exercises.
					
					 All this clearly proves that the joint exercises to be staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique one after another are the largest-ever maneuvers for a war of aggression in view of their scale, period, form and contents.
					
					 The large-scale joint naval exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique are a prelude to the second June 25 war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are now behaving recklessly just as the U.S. imperialists and traitor Syngman Rhee pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase in a bid to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK 60 years ago.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. secretaries of State and Defense toured even the forefront areas along the Military Demarcation Line and the Panmunjom line dividing Korea into the north and the south, kicking up a war fever and letting loose of a spate of vituperation against the DPRK.
					
					 This reminds one of the Seoul visit by the chiefs of the U.S. departments of Defense and State and the inspection of the 38th Parallel by Dulles as a special envoy of the U.S. president on the eve of the Korean war in the last century.
					
					 The south Korea visit by the U.S. secretaries of State and Defense means that the U.S. scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK has reached the phase of its implementation after its final examination from the military and diplomatic points of view.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the U.S. set the date and period of the exercises in the same way it ignited the Korean war on June 25 in the last century. 
					
					 The U.S. codenamed the operation "invincible spirit" and included "Philsung firing range" and "Sungjin training ground" in the venues of the exercises.
					
					 At the same time, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique praised Korean War dead as "fighters who took part in the war," inciting a war fever.
					
					 The U.S. and traitor Lee Myung Bak staged the above-said joint naval exercises under the pretext of "coping with" the "Cheonan" case while describing the "June 25 war as the southward invasion by the north" and the case as "a military provocation by the north". This proves that the sunk warship was nothing but a scapegoat for staging the recent maneuvers for invading the DPRK.
					
					 The joint naval exercises are part of the undisguised provocations being perpetrated by the U.S. to hold military supremacy in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. held a firm grip on south Korea as one of the elements for carrying out its strategy for world domination through the said case and reinforced its foundation.
					
					 It agreed with the puppet authorities to extend the transfer of OPCON, a controversial issue in legalizing the permanent presence of its forces in south Korea till 2015.
					
					 This extension helped the U.S. put south Korea under its inescapable control.
					
					 The U.S., at the same time, clinched the deal with the Japanese government over the issue of the U.S. base in Futenma in order to turn Okinawa which is of weighty importance in realizing its aggressive Asia strategy into a permanent base.
					
					 As a result, the U.S. held a firm grip on south Korea and Japan important for carrying out its aggressive Asia strategy as its junior allies and laid solid political and military foundations for tightening the U.S.-Japan-south Korea "triangular military alliance."
					
					 The U.S. regarded the joint naval exercises as a golden opportunity to demonstrate the "might" of the "triangular military alliance" in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The reckless war maneuvers for aggression staged by the U.S. warmongers created the worst situation on the eve of war on the Korean Peninsula and seriously disturbed the peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 This year marks the lapse of six decades since the launch of the Korean war by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. should have seriously repented of its acts of aggression and positively opted for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty as proposed by the DPRK in order to ensure durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. got more frantic with the moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK. This is an intolerable insult to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, unpardonable provocation and undisguised declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are seriously mistaken.
					
					 History records the great victory won by the heroic Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War in which it immediately went over a counterattack to beat the aggression by the U.S. imperialists, liberating Seoul, the stronghold of the enemies, just in three days and inflicting a disgraceful defeat on the provocateurs in the three year-long war.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet  group ignite the second June 25 war, the army and the people of the DPRK will mobilize all deterrents for self-defense and wipe out the aggressors at a single strike and settle accounts with the U.S. for all the crimes committed against the Korean people.
					
					 June 25, the day the U.S. ignited the war for aggression, will always be followed by July 27, the day the Korean people emerged victorious in the war.

articles.title: Suppression of Organizations for Reunification Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Organizations for Reunification Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang July 31 (KCNA) -- The Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee against Suppression of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 28 denouncing the puppet group for its suppression of the organizations for the reunification movement.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the security authorities of summoning for investigation So Sang Chol, chairman of the Kyonggi-Inchon Confederation of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon). This action was taken in the wake of the frantic search for offices of organizations for the reunification movement including the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and other civic and public organizations and houses of their leading members in May last year, they charged.
					
					 The tentacles of suppression stretched by the authorities to the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and then to regional organizations under it are part of the persistent tyrannical actions against the movement for independent reunification, they noted, and continued:
					
					 The rights of the people can never be guaranteed as long as there exist all sorts of repressive machines and fascist forces creating the terror-ridden situation under the pretext of "security".
					
					 They demanded the authorities abolish the "Security Law" and dismantle such repressive machines as the "Intelligence Service" and the "Security Investigation Group" as early as possible.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Admit Illegality of "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Admit Illegality of "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- At least 1,000 intellectuals of south Korea and Japan issued a joint statement in Japan on July 28 demanding the Japanese authorities admit the illegality of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", according to south Korean MBC.
					 The statement termed the "Korea-Japan annexation" a tyranny of imperialists as the resistance of the Korean nation was put down by force of arms.
					
					 It demanded the Japanese government admit the illegality of the treaty, declare it null and void and apologize for the colonial domination over Korea.
					
					 The intellectuals held a press conference at the Hall of Members of the House of Councilors at which they repeatedly declared the treaty was totally illegal not only in its contents but in its form and procedure.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Its Discriminatory Policy toward Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Its Discriminatory Policy toward Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Japanese civic organizations held a rally in Tokyo on July 22 after forming a committee for joint actions in demand of the discriminatory policy toward Korean schools.
					 At the rally speakers denounced the Japanese government's exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools as a discriminatory act of depriving Korean students in Japan of the right to learn.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the parents of the students of Korean schools have so far fulfilled their legal obligation to pay their taxes, they said that there is no reason for the Korean students to be subject to discriminatory treatment.
					
					 Just is the struggle for the settlement of the issue of tuition-free program for the Korean schools, they said, calling upon Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens to struggle in unity to the last.
					
					 Then, Hiroshi Tanaka, honorary professor at Hitotsubashi University, gave a lecture titled "Intolerable is the exclusion of Korean schools from tuition-free program for senior high schools".
					
					 It is unjust to exclude only Korean schools from the above-said program and this support regime should be applied equally to all schools, he held.
					
					 A declaration calling for settling the above-said issue was adopted at the rally.

articles.title: Early Normalization of DPRK-Japan Relations Called for
articles.content:
Early Normalization of DPRK-Japan Relations Called for
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The national general meeting and rally of the "Liaison Council for Demanding Denuclearization and Peace in Northeast Asia and Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK" took place in Tokyo on July 23.
					 Attending there were figures of civic and solidarity organizations from across Japan active for the normalization of DPRK-Japan relations and masses.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Co-Representative of the liaison council Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, said at the national general meeting that she expected progress to be made in improving Japan-DPRK relations after the regime change in Japan but these relations deteriorated and the Japanese authorities are tightening the military nexus with the U.S. and enforcing a more hostile policy toward the DPRK with the case of the south Korean warship's sinking, in particular, as a momentum.
					
					 Koichi Ishizaka, co-representative and secretary general of the liaison council, reviewed the activities of the liaison council in the last one year. Urging the Japanese government to make a switchover in its policy toward the DPRK, he deemed it as the future tasks to make positive efforts to make the Japanese government lift the sanctions against the DPRK, resume the talks for normalizing Japan-DPRK relations, ensure the rights of the Koreans in Japan and ban chauvinism.
					
					 A report on the movement for Japan-DPRK friendship from across Japan was heard at the national general meeting and opinions were exchanged there.
					
					 Then followed the rally. Speakers said that the relations between the two countries have not improved but deteriorated since the publication of the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration. This fact proves that dialogue and negotiation are the only way of creating the atmosphere of reconciliation and confidence, they said, urging the Japanese government to opt for the talks with the DPRK unconditionally.
					
					 The national general meeting and rally adopted an appeal calling upon the Japanese government to apologize for the past crimes Japan committed against Korea and opt for resuming the said talks.

articles.title: DPRK-targeted Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
DPRK-targeted Joint Military Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots organizations made public a statement denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging joint military exercises to invade the DPRK.
					 The General Association of Koreans in China in its statement on July 28 accused the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war maniacs of contemplating staging various war exercises for invading the DPRK in the wake of the joint naval maneuvers staged in defiance of the strong domestic and foreign opposition.
					
					 The above-said organizations branded the large-scale war exercises targeted against the DPRK as unpardonable provocations disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and blocking reunification and bitterly condemned them in the name of the whole nation, the statement said.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities to immediately halt their war maneuvers bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war, well aware that it is an invariable will of the DPRK to react to "retaliation" with stronger retaliation and to "punishment" with Korean-style merciless punishment.
					
					 The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany in its statement on July 26 noted that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers can never force the DPRK equipped with the strong war deterrent for self-defence to yield to them though they are working hard to start a war with the latest war hardware involved.
					
					 The statement demanded the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak pro-U.S. sycophantic forces stop as early as possible their military provocations threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Halt to US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Urged
articles.content:
Halt to US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Urged
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, issued a statement on July 25 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 He in his statement recalled that 60 years have passed since the outbreak of the Korean war but the U.S. has covered up its inhuman crimes committed in Korea, evaded the responsibility as a war provocateur and is bringing the dark clouds of a war of aggression again.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. has persistently hindered Korea's reunification for the last more than six decades, he charged that the U.S. forces present in south Korea are, indeed, a main obstacle to Korea's reunification.
					
					 It is possible to avert another war in the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace and stability there only when the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea, he said, and went on:
					
					 All the peace-loving people of the world should pay attention to the issue of Korea's reunification.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. to pull all its aggression forces out of south Korea and immediately drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We together with the world progressives will always stand by the Korean people in their struggle to frustrate the moves of the U.S. imperialists to ignite a new war and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas de industria ligera de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas de industria ligera de Kanggye
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno varias fabricas de la rama de industria ligera de la ciudad de Kanggye.
					  Primeramente, el estuvo en la Fabrica Universal de Alimentos Jangjasan, nuevamente construida.
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y de los equipos tecnicos y de produccion recorriendo durante largo tiempo los procesos productivos.
					
					  Se cercioro en detalles del estado de produccion del refresco de pera silvestre y otros productos de frutas y plantas silvestres, el jang-atti, el kuksu (fideo), la torta, el caramelo, la galleta y otros alimentos, probo personalmente el sabor de estos alimentos y mostro gran alegria de que se haya podido suministrar mucho mas los alimentos sabrosos y nutritivos al pueblo.
					
					Dio agradecimiento a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de las fabricas y empresas de la rama relacionada que dedicando toda su inteligencia y entusiasmo produjeron los equipos de elaboracion de alimentos de alto nivel.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la administracion de la fabrica. 
					
					Los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica  deben aumentar mas la produccion poniendo de pleno manifiesto continuamente el caliente amor por el pueblo, senalo y enfatizo en que deben producir gran cantidad de los alimentos subsidiarios sabrosos y nutritivos y otros viveres elaborados para materializar con exito el legado del Presidente de liberar a las mujeres del pesado cargo de las faenas domesticas.
					
					El Dirigente hizo visita de orientacion a la Fabrica de Alimentos Basicos de Kanggye.
					
					Ante todo, recorrio varios procesos de produccion enterandose en detalles del estado de reconstruccion y de produccion de la fabrica. 
					
					Al ver diversos alimentos basicos adecuados al gusto del pueblo coreano que se producen en cadena, aprecio altamente a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos que acondicionaron todos los procesos productivos de acuerdo con la demanda cientifica y tecnica y uniendo las fuerzas e inteligencia, y normalizan en un alto nivel la produccion.
					
					Dado que todos consumen los alimentos basicos, deben procesarlos sabrosamente, dijo y apunto la necesidad de profundizar la investigacion sobre esta rama para asegurar la unificacion de los indices tecnicos y realizar en el nivel alto la cientifizacion de los procesos productivos.
					
					Por ultimo, el Dirigente estuvo en la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Medicamentos Coryo de Kanggye.
					
					Hizo conocimiento concreto del estado de produccion dando vueltas por el exterior y el interior de la fabrica. 
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la fabrica esta arreglada bien en lo higienico y cultural como la planta farmaceutica y produce muchos medicamentos tradicionales eficientes con las hierbas medicinales de distintos generos abundantes en las localidades.
					
					Los antecesores coreanos vivieron durante miles de anos curando las enfermedades solo con los medicamentos tradicionales, dijo y agrego que desarrollar esta medicina reviste suma importancia para fomentar la salud del pueblo.
					
					Enseno que para elevar la eficiencia de los medicamentos tradicionales hay que realizar extraccion de esas medicinas al cientifizar e industrializar su produccion.
					
					Los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang, que se han hecho mil veces fuertes a traves de la "marcha penosa", la forzada, acondicionan por sus propias cuentas todas las ciudades, aldeas, fabricas y puestos de trabajo como paraiso y avanzan a pasos firmes hacia la cima de gran potencia prospera, afirmo y evaluo altamente el entusiasmo patriotico de los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la provincia que son valerosos precursores de la epoca del Songun.
					
					En esta provincia, donde resuenan altamente los cantos de avance de la revolucion, se crean diariamente los milagros y meritos relevantes que sorprenden a todo el mundo, subrayo y destaco que esta realidad orgullosa es el brillante fruto del espiritu de Kanggye y manifiesta el inagotable poderio espiritual de nuestro pueblo.
					
					El Dirigente expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que los trabajadores de la provincia, incluso la ciudad de Kanggye, seguiran cumpliendo satisfactoriamente el papel vanguardista en la magna lucha por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Aparatos Electricos Juventud
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Aparatos Electricos Juventud 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Aparatos Electricos Juventud de Huichon en gran auge revolucionario.
					  Se entero detalladamente del estado de produccion recorriendo los procesos de produccion y viendo los aparatos electricos fabricados nuevamente en la empresa.
					
					  Expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de la empresa hayan traido un cambio trascendental en la produccion de los articulos electricos al realizar en un corto tiempo la modernizacion y cientifizacion basadas en las nuevas tecnicas de punta y desarrollar activamente nuevas tecnicas.
					
					  Con la inteligencia creativa y la cooperacion, los obreros del complejo solucionaron con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas muchos problemas cientifico-tecnicos y lograron un cambio asombroso en la produccion, dijo y destaco que esto deviene el precioso fruto preparado como resultado de que ellos han desplegado la dinamica lucha por conquistar la tecnologia de punta teniendo la extraordinaria conviccion de exaltar la patria con la carrera cerebral y tecnica. 
					
					  Deviene un gran exito el que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del complejo fabricaron en un corto tiempo con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas los articulos electricos ultramodernos, apunto y les dio agradecimiento evaluando altamente las proezas orgullosas de ellos quienes prepararon el excelente regalo al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y la Conferencia de esta entidad politica. 
					
					Senalo que este exito orgulloso logrado por el complejo prueba que al movilizar el inagotable poderio espiritual, la habilidad creativa y la solida potencialidad tecnica y economica de la nacion de Kim Il Sung podran conquistar cualquier fortaleza de punta.
					
					En la epoca de la economia basada en los conocimientos en que se desarrolla vertiginosamente por el progreso general de la ciencia y tecnologia, la gran acumulacion de los conocimientos y su activa aplicacion, el precursor de la tecnologia de punta es el conquistador y triunfador del futuro, asevero y destaco que todos los dominios de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera deben librar con vigor la lucha por conquistar la cumbre tecnologica.
					
					Volvio a exhortar calurosamente a todos los sectores y unidades a levantar mas furiosamente la tempestad de saltos y lanzar solemnemente las salvas de victoria y jubilo sobre el cielo de octubre.
					
					Presento las tareas que le incumben al complejo en normalizar en un nivel alto la produccion y expreso la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de ahi cumpliran magnificamente en el futuro tambien el papel de vanguardia y brigada en la magna construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang Pak To Chun, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige varias fabricas de la provincia de Jagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige varias fabricas de la provincia de Jagang
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno varias fabricas de la provincia de Jagang que dan saltos a la cumbre tecnologica.
					  Primeramente, estuvo en el Combinado de Tractores de Kanggye, fabrica modelo en la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC.
					
					  Al recorrer varios talleres y los productos de la fabrica, se entero detalladamente del estado de la renovacion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					Los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica cambiaron la planta conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la economia basada en los conocimientos mediante el energico movimiento masivo por la innovacion tecnica y aceleran la gran marcha por la conquista de la cumbre tecnologica, lo cual es una cosa digna de enorgullecernos, dijo y evaluo altamente el estilo de trabajo revolucionario y la actitud de labor emprendedora de ellos que crean incesantes innovaciones y avances.
					
					El que la fabrica tiene la capacidad de producir tambien las maquinas que demandan la alta tecnica, deviene el prodigio creado por el indoblegable poderio espiritual, el estilo de trabajo y el espiritu de Kanggye de los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang consolidados en mil veces a traves de la "marcha penosa", la forzada.
					
					El Dirigente recorrio el ganadero de patos construido por la fabrica y elogio altamente los esfuerzos de los funcionarios de la fabrica quienes prepararon las excelentes condiciones de la vida alimentaria y de descanso cultural para los obreros.
					
					Esta fabrica es ejemplo tanto en la modernizacion como en el trabajo de servicio de abastecimiento y la cultura de produccion y vida, senalo y enfatizo que todas las unidades deben aprender las experiencias de esta planta.
					
					El Dirigente vio el ejercicio de extincion de incendio que el cuerpo fabril de bomberos realiza con los aparatos fabricados por sus propias fuerzas en la fabrica.
					
					Presento las tares programaticas que sirven de guia en la administracion y produccion de la fabrica.
					
					  El Dirigente dirigio en el mismo terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang.
					
					Haciendo recorrido por varios lugares de la fabrica se cercioro en detalles de la facultad, la estructura y los principios de operacion de las maquinas herramientas CNC y expreso gran satisfaccion de que los obreros de la fabrica producen mucho las excelentes maquinas convenientes a la demanda del nuevo siglo y evaluo altamente sus meritos.
					
					Senalo que esta fabrica es precisamente una de las fabricas ejemplares que ostenta el orgulloso aspecto de la industria del Juche.
					
					Hoy dia, si Corea decide, fabrica facilmente cualesquier maquinas sofisticadas, apunto y asevero con orgullo que esta realidad orgullosa prueba elocuentemente que la industria maquinaria autoctona de Corea esta situada dignamente en el nivel de punta mundial.
					
					A fin de producir mayor cantidad de las modernas maquinas convenientes a la demanda del nuevo siglo en la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang, es preciso seguir concentrando las fuerzas a la labor de transformacion tecnica basada en la tecnica de punta y realizar en el nivel mas alto la modernizacion y la precision de los procesos productivos, la estandarizacion y la normalizacion de los productos.
					
					El Dirigente volvio a fijar el objeto de lucha a ser conquistada en el tiempo cercano por la fabrica, ilumino las tareas y los remedios concretos por el particular y soluciono los problemas pendientes.
					
					Se fotografio junto a los innovadores laborales de la fabrica. 
					
					Seguidamente, el visito la Fabrica Textil Septiembre. 
					
					Al ver los objetos y datos historicos exhibidos en la sala de presentacion del historial, recordo con gran emocion los inolvidables dias de la historia.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion y minuciosas instrucciones del Presidente Kim Il Sung la Fabrica Textil Septiembre se ha convertido en una gran base de produccion de tela del pais, senalo y subrayo que el pueblo coreano no olvidara eternamente el gran amor y beneficios del Presidente quien dedico todos los esfuerzos por resolver el problema de vestimenta del pueblo.
					
					Al recorrer el taller de hilado No.3 y otros varios lugares se entero detalladamente del estado de la promocion de modernizacion y de la produccion.
					
					Al ver los datos de lucha de las benemeritas quienes han venido trabajando con sinceridad durante largo tiempo en la fabrica, evaluo sus proezas y destaco que en la epoca del Partido del Trabajo las mujeres coreanas exaltan su fama y valor de su existencia que no pudieron lograr en el pasado.
					
					Este cambio secular en la posicion y papel de las mujeres coreanas demuestra claramente que ellas, con el fuerte caracter revolucionario y combativo, son las fuerzas potentes que impulsan energicamente la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Recorriendo el comedor interior construido nuevamente en la fabrica y otras instalaciones de intendencia presto profunda atencion a la vida de los obreros.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Senalo que el PTC tiene la firme decision y voluntad de ofrecer mejores vestidos al pueblo y subrayo la necesidad de prestar gran atencion a la produccion de tela para registrar nuevo cambio en la solucion del problema de vestimenta.
					
					Es muy importante la labor de servicio de abastecimiento en esta fabrica donde las mujeres ocupan la mayoria, enseno y destaco que la organizacion del partido y los funcionarios de la fabrica deben prestar siempre profunda atencion a asegurar las magnificas condiciones de vida a las obreras.
					
					El Dirigente presencio en el mismo terreno la funcion de los miembros del grupo artistico obrero de la fabrica.
					
					Tras verla se mostro muy satisfecho de que la clase obrera revolucionaria y combativa de Corea cumple excelentemente el papel vanguardista tambien en la creacion de nueva cultura.
					
					Expreso gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de la fabrica produciran y suministraran mucho las telas de buena calidad desplegando la energica lucha por materializar la orientacion del partido de registrar la revolucion en la industria ligera y haran gran aporte a la realizacion de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Destaco que en todas las fabricas y empresas de la provincia de Jagang se libran la energica lucha por conquistar la tecnologia de punta y crear nueva norma y nuevo record, e hizo hincapie en que esta provincia debe ponerse al frente tambien en el cumplimiento de las tareas de la revolucion tecnologica.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang Pak To Chun, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Myanmar
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Myanmar
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 30 en Nay Pyi Taw las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, de visita en Myanmar, y su homologo de este pais asiatico U Nyan Win.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana la comitiva del canciller y el embajador en ese pais, y por la otra, los directores generales de departamentos de Politica y de ASEAN del MINREX y otros funcionarios.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros problemas regionales e internacionales de interes mutuo.

articles.title: ATCC condena entrenamiento militar de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC condena entrenamiento militar de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea hizo publica el dia 31 el acta de acusacion intitulada "Condena el entrenamiento de agresion al Norte que acarrea la segunda version del 25 de junio" en relacion con los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos que desarrollan Estados Unidos y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas.
					La nota senala:
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos despliegan los entrenamientos maritimos contra la RPDC de gran envergadura sin precedentes en la historia tendentes a asestar el ataque sorpresivo nuclear a nuestro pais desde el mar y el aire.
					
					Tuvieron lugar del 25 al 28 de julio en el Mar Este de Corea los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos de gran envergadura nunca vistos en la historia.
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana movilizaron en este simulacro las fuerzas armadas equivalentes a mas de 10 veces en comparacion con los entrenamientos pasados.
					
					Partiendo de su malsana intencion de realizar el "ataque simultaneo" sobre toda la extension de la RPDC, EE.UU. movilizo  los medios ofensivos ultramodernos.
					
					Dio vueltas por el Mar Este de Corea el portaaviones nuclear "George Washington" perteneciente a la septima flota norteamericana llamado como "flotante base militar" cuya radio de operacion es de mil kilometros y capaz de dar salidas a los cazabombarderos en mas de 150 veces al dia.
					
					Los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos quedaron iniciados con el "ataque" al Norte por las enormes fuerzas en torno al portaaviones armado con decenas de aviones incluyendo los cazas y Awacs. Y tomandolo por punto de apoyo, decenas de buques de guerra y otros medios tecnicos de combate entraron en distintos entrenamientos.
					
					Tambien EE.UU. introdujo por primera vez el caza ultramoderno "F-22A Raptor", que no movilizo ni siquiera en las guerras iraqui y afgana.
					
					Ademas, fueron movilizados en el simulacro mas de 200 aviones incluyendo el "F-16", el "A-10" y el "KC-135", mas de 20 buques de guerra de diferentes tipos y mas de 8 mil efectivos.
					
					Pero,  EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana hablan tanto de que el presente simulacro es para buscar el submarino de alguien y disuadir su "provocacion" 
					
					 EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos convirtieron todo el proceso de los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos en un curso para llevar a efecto el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					Lo cuestionable es que los presentes ejercicios no terminan en una simple "manifestacion militar".
					
					EE.UU. y la banda de titeres surcoreanos anunciaron publicamente que ampliaran mas la esfera de los presentes ejercicios y desplegaran hasta finales del ano en curso mas de 10 ejercicios conjuntos en el mar, el cielo y la tierra incluso el ejercicio antisubmarinos.
					
					Todo esto comprueba claramente que los ejercicios conjuntos, que desarrollan sucesivamente EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, son ejercicios previos de guerra de agresion nunca vistos tanto en su dimension y periodo como en su forma y contenido.
					
					Por lo tanto, los presentes ejercicios son el preludio que acarrea en la Peninsula Coreana el 25 de junio de segunda version.
					
					Hoy dia, EE.UU. y los compinches del traidor Lee Myung Bak actuan con imprudencia como en aquel momento de hace ahora 60 anos cuando los imperialistas norteamericanos y el traidor Syngman Rhee llevaban a la peor fase la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana con el fin de desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC. 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que los secretarios de Estado y de Defensa de EE.UU. dieron vueltas por la zona avanzada de la linea de demarcacion militar y hasta la linea divisoria central de Phanmunjom fomentando el ambiente de guerra y soltaron sin escrupulos las palabras hostiles contra la RPDC.
					
					Esto hace recordar la gira de los cabecillas de los departamentos de Defensa y de Estado norteamericanos, realizada en visperas de la guerra coreana del siglo pasado, y la inspeccion del enviado especial del presidente norteamericano Deles a la zona del paralelo Norte 38o.
					
					La reciente visita al Sur de Corea de los secretarios de Defensa y de Estado norteamericanos significa que el plan de EE.UU. de desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC ya paso la revision final tanto en lo militar como en lo diplomatico y ahora entra en la practica.
					
					En efecto, EE.UU. imito el 25 de junio del siglo pasado en fijar el dia de comienzo y el periodo de los presentes ejercicios belicos.
					
					El imperio denomino la operacion como "espiritu invencible" e incorporo a los lugares de ejercicios el "campo de tiro Philsung" y el "campo de entrenamiento Sungjin". 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana alaban a los muertos en la pasada guerra coreana como "combatientes" infundiendo el clima de guerra.
					
					EE.UU. y el traidor Lee Myung Bak describen la pasada guerra coreana como "la agresion del Norte contra el Sur" y califican el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" de una "provocacion militar del Norte". Y desarrollan los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos de gran envergadura para "tomar las contramedidas". Todo esto comprueba que el buque surcoreano de guerra hundido no pasa de ser una victima para librar los ejercicios de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Ademas, los presentes ejercicios belicos devienen una abierta provocacion de EE.UU. tendente a tomar la supremacia militar en la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					A traves del caso del "Cheonan", EE.UU. agarro mas fuertemente al Sur de Corea como uno de los componentes principales para realizar su estrategia de dominio al mundo y fortalecio mas el fundamento para este fin.
					
					Y acordo con las autoridades titeres prolongar hasta el ano 2015 el periodo de la "transferencia del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra", que era problematica en legalizar su ocupacion perpetua sobre el Sur de Corea.
					
					Con este compromiso EE.UU. sometio completamente a su dominio al Sur de Corea.
					
					Ademas, EE.UU. acordo con el gobierno japones el problema de traslado de su base de Futenma con el fin de convertir como su base eterna Okinawa que reviste una suma importancia en la realizacion de su estrategia sobre Asia de caracter agresivo. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, EE.UU. preparo la firme garantia politico-militar capaz de consolidar mas el sistema de "alianza tripartita" con Japon y el Sur de Corea, teniendo como sus lacayos a ellos que toman una posicion importante en la realizacion de su agresiva estrategia sobre Asia.
					
					Al intensificar la alianza con el Sur de Corea y Japon, EE.UU. considero los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos como la oportunidad optima para manifestar el "poderio" de la "alianza tripartita" en la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Debido a las imprudentes maniobras de los belicistas norteamericanos, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea la situacion peor a punto de estallar la guerra y se perturban gravemente la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Este ano se cumple el 60o aniversario de la guerra coreana desatada por EE.UU.
					
					Pues, el imperio ha de reflexionarse, debidamente, con seriedad de sus actos de agresion y responder positivamente a la propuesta de la RPDC de sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz para preservar la paz duradera y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. se aferra con mas frenesi a la provocacion de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, lo cual deviene un insulto y provocacion imperdonables a la dignidad y la soberania de esta y una abierta declaracion de guerra.
					
					EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos estan equivocados mucho. 
					
					La historia registra el gran triunfo del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea que en la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria libero a los tres dias de la guerra a Seul, bastion de los enemigos, respondiendo a la invasion armada de los imperialistas norteamericanos con el contraataque inmediato, y dio a los tres anos de la guerra la derrota vergonzosa a los provocadores. 
					
					Si EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos desatan la segunda guerra coreana, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea aniquilaran de un solo golpe a los invasores, valiendose de todos sus disuasivos de autodefensa y saldran cuenta final de los crimenes de EE.UU. cometidos contra el pueblo coreano. 
					
					Detras del 25 de junio de agresion de EE.UU. siempre esta el 27 de julio de gran triunfo del pueblo coreano.
